Class TopicController

java.lang.Object
ch.quizinno.brainquest.controllers.TopicController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/topics") public class TopicController extends Object
Controller for managing topics.

      Returns:

    • updateTopic

      Update a topic by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the topic to update
      topicDetails - the topic to update
      Returns:
      the updated topic

    • deleteTopic

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteTopic(@PathVariable Long id)
      Delete a topic by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the topic to delete
      Returns:
      a response entity with no content
